00008 sub CAPA_ans {
00009     my $ans = shift;
00010     my %options = @_;
00011     my $answer_evaluator = 0;
00012 
00013     #TEXT("answerCounter =". ++$problemCounter,"$BR"); # checking whether values are reinitialized
00014 
00015     # explicitlty delete options which are meaningless to WeBWorK
00016     if (defined($options{'sig'})) { delete($options{'sig'}); }
00017     if (defined($options{'wgt'})) { delete($options{'wgt'}); }
00018     if (defined($options{'tries'})) { delete($options{'tries'}); }
00019 
00020 #   $options{'allow_unknown_options'} = 1;  ## if uncommented, this is a fast and possibly dangerous
00021                                             ## way to prevent warning message about unknown options
00022 
00023 
00024     if (defined($options{'reltol'}) or defined($options{'tol'}) or defined($options{'unit'})  ) {
00025 
00026         if (defined( $options{'unit'} ) ) {
00027             #$ans = "$ans  $options{'unit'}";
00028             $answer_evaluator = num_cmp($ans, 'format'  =>  $options{format},
00029                                                reltol   =>  ( defined($options{reltol}) ) ? $options{reltol} :undef,
00030                                                tol      =>  ( defined($options{tol})    ) ? $options{tol} : undef ,
00031                                                unit     =>  $options{unit},
00032             );
00033         } else { # numerical compare:
00034             if (defined($options{'reltol'})  ) {  #relative tolerance is given with a percent sign
00035                     my $reltol =  $options{ 'reltol' };
00036                     my $format = $options{'format'} if defined($options{'format'});
00037                     $answer_evaluator = num_cmp($ans,reltol=>$reltol,'format' => $format);
00038             } elsif (defined($options{'tol'})  ) {
00039                     my $format = $options{'format'} if defined($options{'format'});
00040                     $answer_evaluator = num_cmp($ans,tol => $options{'tol'}, 'format' => $format);
00041             } else {
00042                    my $tol = $ans*$main::numRelPercentTolDefault;
00043                    my $format = $options{'format'} if defined($options{'format'});
00044                    $answer_evaluator = num_cmp($ans,reltol=> $tol,'format'=> $format);
00045             }
00046         }
00047     } else {
00048        # string comparisons
00049        if ( defined($options{'str'})  and   $options{'str'} =~/CS/i )  {
00050                 $answer_evaluator =str_cmp($ans,filters=>['compress_whitespace']);
00051        } elsif  ( defined($options{'str'}) and $options{'str'} =~/MC/i )  {
00052                 $answer_evaluator = str_cmp($ans,filters=>[qw( compress_whitespace ignore_case ignore_order )]);
00053        } else {
00054                 $answer_evaluator = str_cmp($ans,filters=>[qw( compress_whitespace ignore_case )]);
00055        }
00056     }
00057 
00058    $answer_evaluator;
00059 }

00061 sub CAPA_import {
00062     my $filePath = shift;
00063     my %save_envir = %main::envir;
00064     my $r_string =  read_whole_problem_file($filePath);
00065 
00066     $main::envir{'probFileName'} = $filePath;
00067     $main::envir{'fileName'} = $filePath;
00068     includePGtext($r_string); # the 0 prevents  a new Safe compartment from being used
00069     %main::envir = %save_envir;
00070 }

00074 sub CAPA_map {
00075     my $seed = shift;
00076     my $array_var_ref = shift;
00077     my $PGrand = new PGrandom($seed);
00078     local $main::array_values_ref = shift;   # this must be local since it must be passed to PG_restricted_eval
00079     my $size = @$main::array_values_ref;  # get number of values
00080     my @array = 0..($size-1);
00081     my @slice = ();
00082     while ( @slice < $size) {
00083         push(@slice, splice(@array , $PGrand->random(0,$#array) , 1) );
00084     }
00085     my $string = "";
00086     my $var;
00087     my $i = 0;
00088      foreach $var (@$array_var_ref) {
00089         $string .= "\$$var = \$\$main::array_values_ref[ $slice[$i++]]; ";
00090      }
00091 
00092      # it is important that PG-restriced eval can accesss the $array_values_ref
00093      my($val, $PG_eval_errors,$PG_full_error_report) =PG_restricted_eval($string);
00094      my $out = '';
00095      $string =~ s/\$/\\\$/g;  # protect variables for error message
00096      $out = "Error in MAP subroutine: $PG_eval_errors <BR>\n" . $string ." <BR>\n" if $PG_eval_errors;
00097      $out;
00098 }

00142 sub isNumberQ {  # determine whether the input is a number
00143     my $in = shift;
00144     $in =~ /^[\d\.\+\-Ee]+$/;
00145 }

00188 sub CAPA_EV {
00189 
00190    my $out = &EV3(@_);
00191    $out  =~ s/\n\n/\n/g;  # hack to prevent introduction of paragraphs in TeX??
00192    # HACK TO DO THE RIGHT THING WITH DOLLAR SIGNS
00193    $out = ev_substring($out,"/*/*","/*/*",\&display_math_ev3);
00194    $out = ev_substring($out,"/*","/*",\&math_ev3);
00195    # TEXT($main::BR, $main::BR, $out,$main::BR,$main::BR);
00196    $out;
00197 }
